resources.string: Follow below steps to permit location Permission
On the next screen, please activate the device administrator. This permission is used to prevent your children from uninstalling the application without your authorization.
Enable location access to stay informed about your children\'s whereabouts
On the next screen, please set location permission to “Allow all the time” to continuously track your child\'s location.

On the next screens:
1. Ensure “Precise location” is selected.
2. Choose “While using the app.”
3. Finally, select “Allow all the time” for continuous tracking of your child's location.
On the next screens:\n1. Choose “While using the app.”\n2. Finally, select “Allow all the time” for continuous tracking of your child\'s location.
On the next screen, please allow the overlay permission. This permission is used to display a friendly blocking message instead of harmful Internet content.
On the next screen, please enable Display Pop-Up In Background to always keep your family safe from harmful Internet content.
On the next Screen, Please allow the camera permission. This permission is to capture the picture when thief try to unlock the device
Protect Digital Protection from being easily uninstalled by activating the device administrator.
